Body_Html:
Experience relaxation with our Lavender Showers Box- the perfect gift for anyone who loves the soothing and calming scent of lavender. This carefully curated box features:

  • Lavender & Sage Soap
  • Relax Shower Steamer
  • Dream Shower Steamer
  • Lavender Vanilla Candle 
  • Signature Lip Balm

To make this box an extra special treat, all you need to do is choose a card from our selection of beautiful designs. Each card is handwritten with your personalized message to add that special touch to your gift.

Make gift giving easy by choosing from our selection of soy candles. These perfectly wrapped Mini Candle Gift Boxes are perfect for any candle lover. This gift box includes:

  • 8 Ounce Tin Candle
  • Lip Balm
  • Handwritten Greeting Card

If you would like to leave the card blank, please indicate "Blank" under the text field.

Product_Title: Frozen Pine | 3 Wick Dough Bowl Candle
Body_Html:
A blend of your traditional Christmas favorites including Pine, Fir, Balsam and Cypress with the light sweetness of apples. This Christmas blend is a beautiful mix of your favorite winter woods scent with a twist. 

Each candle is made with a hand carved dough bowl candle, hand poured in small batches, and finished with 3 wicks. This isn't just any old candle, it is a warm and inviting centerpiece.

This holiday scent is warm with a touch of sweetness. The woodsy yet warm cinnamon scent mixed with cranberry, citrus, and vanilla is a beautiful blend for the holidays. 

These handmade soaps are paraben free, preservative free, SLS/Sulfate free, phthalate free and cruelty free.

A wonderful holiday blend for our Christmas fans. The three pine tree blends of evergreen, cypress and fir are sure to bring delight. 

These handmade soaps are paraben free, preservative free, SLS/Sulfate free, phthalate free and cruelty free.

A blend of your traditional Christmas favorites including Pine, Fir, Balsam and Cypress with the light sweetness of apples. This Christmas blend is a beautiful mix of your favorite winter woods scent with a twist. 

Candle is 8 ounces with approximately 40 hours of burn time. We recommend trimming the wick to 1/4 inch prior to burn and in-between each burn.

A relaxing blend of lemongrass, black currant, sweet fig and jasmine that will work to condition and detangle both straight and curly hair.

Formulated for dry to oily hair and color safe. To extend the life of your bar, store on a draining soap dish or soap saver bag to keep dry in between uses.

Enjoy this elevated blend of lemongrass, black currant, fig and jasmine. Formulated to nourish and hydrate all while cleansing your hair.

Formulated for dry to oily hair and color safe. To extend the life of your bar, store on a draining soap dish or soap saver bag to keep dry in between uses.

A elegantly scent reminiscent of our childhood. It captures the essence of gardenia in bloom with notes of jasmine, magnolia and a light white musk. 

These handmade soaps are paraben free, preservative free, SLS/Sulfate free, phthalate free and cruelty free.

This soap is refreshingly clean. It is a crisp mint combined with notes of lemon, verbena and eucalyptus for a uplifting yet lightly sweet scent. 

These handmade soaps are paraben free, preservative free, SLS/Sulfate free, phthalate free and cruelty free.

This soap is a year round favorite! A soothing scent with notes of sage leaf, chamomile flower, bergamot and rose petals. 

These handmade soaps are paraben free, preservative free, SLS/Sulfate free, phthalate free and cruelty free.

This mix of pumpkin, marshmallow and warm vanilla notes is a fall favorite! A scent almost decadent enough to eat, almost! 

These handmade soaps are paraben free, preservative free, SLS/Sulfate free, phthalate free and cruelty free.
